verbose_text: However, a corresponding base in NBS (adenine 1) positions itself closer to enable hydrogen bonding with this Q173 residue (XREF_FIG A); this is possibly due to conformational changes in the NBS site that narrows the minor groove width at the adenine 1 : thymine -1 position (from ~ 7.7 to ~ 3.7 A; XREF_SUPPLEMENTARY).
evidence: NBS (adenine 1) positions itself closer to enable hydrogen
